languages.text: Монструозное сооружение величественно нависает над вами. Разлитая в воздухе энергия мутит разум. На мгновение вам кажется, что не только вы изучаете обелиск, но и он всматривается в вас.

traits.locale_text: Монструозное сооружение величественно нависает над вами. Разлитое в воздухе электричество мутит разум. На мгновение вам кажется, что не только вы изучаете обелиск, но и он всматривается в вас.

languages.text: The monstrous structure looms majestically over you. The energy spilt into the air obstructs your mind. For a moment, it seems that not only are you studying the obelisk, but it is also studying you.
languages.original_text: Монструозное сооружение величественно нависает над вами. Разлитая в воздухе энергия мутит разум. На мгновение вам кажется, что не только вы изучаете обелиск, но и он всматривается в вас.

traits.locale_text: The monstrous structure looms majestically over you. Energy spilled into the air sickens the mind. For a moment, it seems to you that not only are you studying the obelisk, but it is also peering into you.

The monstrous structure looms majestically over you. Energy spilled into the air sickens the mind. For a moment, it seems to you that not only are you studying the obelisk, but it is also peering into you.

The monstrous structure looms majestically over you. The energy spilled into the air obstructs your mind. For a moment, it seems that not only are you studying the obelisk, but it is also studying you.

The monstrous structure looms majestically over you. The energy spilt into the air obstructs your mind. For a moment, it seems that not only are you studying the obelisk, but it is also studying you.
The monstrous structure looms majestically over you. The energy spilt into the air obstructs your mind. For a moment, it seems that not only are you studying the obelisk, but it is also studying you.

languages.text: La monumental estructura se yergue majestuosa ante ti. La energía que inunda el aire nubla tu mente. Por un momento, parece que además de estudiar el obelisco, es el obelisco el que te estudia a ti.
languages.original_text: The monstrous structure looms majestically over you. The energy spilt into the air obstructs your mind. For a moment, it seems that not only are you studying the obelisk, but it is also studying you.

traits.locale_text: La monumental estructura se yergue majestuosa ante ti. La energía que inunda el aire nubla tu mente. Por un momento, parece que además de estudiar el obelisco, es el obelisco el que te estudia a ti.

languages.text: La monstrueuse structure se dresse majestueusement au-dessus de vous. L'énergie déversée dans l'air entrave votre esprit. Pendant un instant, vous avez l'impression que l'obélisque vous étudie tout autant que vous l'étudiez.
languages.original_text: The monstrous structure looms majestically over you. The energy spilt into the air obstructs your mind. For a moment, it seems that not only are you studying the obelisk, but it is also studying you.

traits.locale_text: La monstrueuse structure se dresse majestueusement au-dessus de vous. L'énergie déversée dans l'air entrave votre esprit. Pendant un instant, vous avez l'impression que l'obélisque vous étudie tout autant que vous l'étudiez.

languages.text: 巨大な建造物は荘厳にそびえ立っている。大気に漏れ出したエネルギーが精神活動を妨げる。一瞬、あなたがオベリスクを研究しているというだけではなく、オベリスクの方もあなたを研究しているように感じられた。
languages.original_text: The monstrous structure looms majestically over you. The energy spilt into the air obstructs your mind. For a moment, it seems that not only are you studying the obelisk, but it is also studying you.

traits.locale_text: 巨大な建造物は荘厳にそびえ立っている。大気に漏れ出したエネルギーが精神活動を妨げる。一瞬、あなたがオベリスクを研究しているというだけではなく、オベリスクの方もあなたを研究しているように感じられた。

languages.text: 畸形的结构在你头顶巍然耸立，弥漫在空气中的能量阻滞了你的思维。那一瞬间，仿佛不仅仅是你在研究这座方尖碑，这座方尖碑也同样在在研究你。
languages.original_text: The monstrous structure looms majestically over you. The energy spilt into the air obstructs your mind. For a moment, it seems that not only are you studying the obelisk, but it is also studying you.

traits.locale_text: 畸形的结构在你头顶巍然耸立，弥漫在空气中的能量阻滞了你的思维。那一瞬间，仿佛不仅仅是你在研究这座方尖碑，这座方尖碑也同样在在研究你。

languages.text: Das monströse Gebilde ragt majestätisch über dir auf. Die Energie, die in die Luft entweicht, behindert deinen Verstand. Einen Augenblick lang wirkt es, als würdest nicht nur du den Obelisken studieren, sondern auch er dich.
languages.original_text: The monstrous structure looms majestically over you. The energy spilt into the air obstructs your mind. For a moment, it seems that not only are you studying the obelisk, but it is also studying you.

traits.locale_text: Das monströse Gebilde ragt majestätisch über dir auf. Die Energie, die in die Luft entweicht, behindert deinen Verstand. Einen Augenblick lang wirkt es, als würdest nicht nur du den Obelisken studieren, sondern auch er dich.

languages.text: Devasa yapı, tüm görkemiyle önünde beliriyor. Havaya yayılmış enerji, zihinsel süreçlerine engel oluyor. Bir anlığına yalnızca sen onu incelemiyormuşsun, aynı zamanda o da seni inceliyormuş gibi hissediyorsun.
languages.original_text: The monstrous structure looms majestically over you. The energy spilt into the air obstructs your mind. For a moment, it seems that not only are you studying the obelisk, but it is also studying you.
